solution.text:
Since New price < Old price, Decrease = Old price - New price.
Decrease = 50000-_{{500*j}}_ = _{{500*(100-j)}}_
Decrease percentage = (Decrease/Old Price) x 100
Therefore, decrease percentage = (_{{500*(100-j)}}_/50000) x 100 = _{{100-j}}_ %

content.text: Price of a new computer going from Rs. 50000 to Rs. _{{j*500}}_.
